# EU GDP
## GDP Per Capita in Relation to EU Index (100)


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide', fig.width=12, fig.height=6, out.width = "100%"}

eu_gdp_df <- read.csv('archetypes/eu_gdp.csv')

v1 = ggplot(eu_gdp_df, aes(year, gdp_pc)) +
  geom_line(color = "steelblue") +
  facet_geo(~ name, grid = "eu_grid1", scales = "free_y") +
  scale_x_continuous(labels = function(x) paste0("'", substr(x, 3, 4))) +
  ylab("GDP Per Capita in Relation to EU Index (100)") +
  theme_bw()

v1

```


## Save output to file


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide'}

ggsave(filename = "geo-facet-v1.svg", plot = v1, width=12, height=6)

```
